1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Decode specific-type contents.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Decode.Type
6  ( treesTexts,
7    treesInterp,
8    treesType,
9  ) where
10
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture              as O
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                  as B
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax                as S
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type                  as T
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Decode.Term      as D
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Pattern        as P
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Decode.Message   as Msg
18
19
20-- ----------------------  Text
21
22-- | Get single text from token trees.
23--
24--   >>> S.toTrees "'aa 'bb" >>= treesTexts True
25--   Right ["aa","bb"]
26--
27--   >>> S.toTrees "\"aa\" \"bb\"" >>= treesTexts True
28--   Right ["aabb"]
29--
30treesTexts :: Bool -> [S.Tree] -> B.Ab [String]
31treesTexts q = mapM $ treeText q
32
33-- | Get text from token tree.
34--
35--   >>> S.toTree "aa" >>= treeText False
36--   Right "aa"
37--
38treeText :: Bool -> S.Tree -> B.Ab String
39treeText q (P.L tok) = tokenString q tok
40treeText _ _ = Msg.nothing
41
42-- | Get quoted/unquoted text.
43tokenString :: Bool -> S.Token -> B.Ab String
44tokenString True  (P.T q w) | q > S.TextRaw  = Right w
45tokenString False (P.TRaw w)                 = Right w
46tokenString _ _  = Msg.nothing
47
48
49-- ----------------------  Interp
50
51-- | Get interpretation from token trees.
52--
53--   >>> S.toTrees "term /a" >>= treesInterp
54--   Right (Interp { interpWords = [InterpText "term", InterpTerm "a"],
55--                   interpTerms = ["a"] })
56--
57treesInterp :: [S.Tree] -> B.Ab T.Interp
58treesInterp = Right . T.interp O.#. mapM treeInterpWord
59
60treeInterpWord :: S.Tree -> B.Ab T.InterpWord
61treeInterpWord (B.TreeB _ _ _) = Msg.nothing
62treeInterpWord (B.TreeL x) =
63    case x of
64      S.TText _ _ w   -> Right $ T.InterpText w
65      S.TTerm _ n     -> Right $ T.InterpTerm $ S.toTermName n
66      _               -> Msg.nothing
67
68
69-- ----------------------  Type
70
71-- | Decode type content.
72treesType :: [S.Tree] -> B.Ab T.Type
73treesType = gen where
74    gen xs = case S.divideTreesByBar xs of
75               [x] ->  single x
76               xs2 ->  Right . T.TypeSum O.# mapM gen xs2
77
78    single [P.B _ xs]        = gen xs
79    single (P.LText f n : xs)
80        | f == S.TextRaw     = dispatch n xs
81        | otherwise          = Msg.quoteType n
82    single []                = Right $ T.TypeSum []
83    single _                 = Msg.unkType ""
84
85    precision ws [P.LRaw w] | w `elem` ws = Right $ Just w
86    precision _ []  = Right Nothing
87    precision _ _   = Msg.unkType "precision"
88
89    clock = ["sec", "min", "hour", "day"]
90    time  = "month" : clock
91
92    dispatch "any"     _    = Right T.TypeAny
93    dispatch "empty"   _    = Right T.TypeEmpty
94    dispatch "boolean" _    = Right T.TypeBool
95    dispatch "text"    _    = Right T.TypeText
96    dispatch "code"    _    = Right T.TypeCode
97    dispatch "decimal" _    = Right T.TypeDec
98    dispatch "clock"   xs   = Right . T.TypeClock  O.# precision clock xs
99    dispatch "time"    xs   = Right . T.TypeTime   O.# precision time  xs
100    dispatch "binary"  _    = Right T.TypeBin
101    dispatch "term"    _    = Right T.TypeTerm
102    dispatch "type"    _    = Right T.TypeType
103    dispatch "interp"  _    = Right T.TypeInterp
104
105    dispatch "tag"   xs     = case xs of
106                                [tag, colon, typ]
107                                    | treeText False colon == Right ":"
108                                      -> do tag' <- treeText False tag
109                                            typ' <- gen [typ]
110                                            Right $ T.TypeTag tag' typ'
111                                _   -> Msg.unkType "tag"
112    dispatch "list"  xs     = Right . T.TypeList O.# gen xs
113    dispatch "set"   xs     = Right . T.TypeSet  O.# gen xs
114    dispatch "tuple" xs     = do ts <- mapM (gen. B.list1) xs
115                                 Right $ T.TypeTuple ts
116    dispatch "tie"   xs     = do ts1 <- D.treesTerms xs
117                                 ts2 <- B.sequenceSnd (gen O.<$$> ts1)
118                                 Right $ T.TypeTie ts2
119    dispatch "rel"   xs     = do ts1 <- D.treesTerms xs
120                                 ts2 <- B.sequenceSnd (gen O.<$$> ts1)
121                                 Right $ T.TypeRel ts2
122    dispatch n _            = Msg.unkType n
